      • follow

        public void follow(ZbeEntityBase entity,
          float minX,
          float maxX,
          float minY,
          float maxY)
        Set the camera to follow the target ZbeEntity
        Parameters:
        entity - ZbeEntity to follow
        minX - minimum X position of the camera from the left edge
        maxX - maximum X position of the camera from the right edge
        minY - minimum Y position of the camera from the bottom edge
        maxY - maximum Y position of the camera from the top edge
